summary: Complete end-to-end testing of 'Gangue da Maverick' memorial website MVP. All core features tested successfully including backend APIs, frontend functionality, and integration between systems.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 14 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Landing page - Animation, navigation, and theme styling
Members grid - All 8 members displayed correctly
Member profiles - Complete dossier information and navigation
Comments system - Add and view comments with proper integration
Gallery system - Add photos with URL validation and display
Quotes system - Add, view quotes with member attribution
Admin panel - Complete CRUD operations for member management
Navigation - All page transitions working smoothly
Frontend-backend integration - All API calls successful
Design consistency - Secret dossier theme maintained throughout
